    PercolatorFieldMapper.TypeParser  
    PercolatorHighlightSubFetchPhase
    Highlighting in the case of the percolate query is a bit different, because the PercolateQuery itself doesn't get highlighted, but the source of the PercolateQuery gets highlighted by each hit containing a query.
